name: Fontaine Aspic
description: A cold dish made from seafood. Grind fish meat into a paste and add it to a rectangular mold to be baked. Leave the dish to cool before serving. It feels cold on the tongue but warm in the heart.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Fontaine Aspic
suspicious.description: A cold dish made from seafood. It makes a nice appetizer so long as you can avoid the traps — fish bones to be more precise — hidden within the aspic.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Fontaine Aspic
normal.description: A cold dish made from seafood. Grind fish meat into a paste and add it to a rectangular mold to be baked. Leave the dish to cool before serving. It feels cold on the tongue but warm in the heart.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 9% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Fontaine Aspic
delicious.description: A cold dish made from seafood. The fish roe in the aspic explodes on your tastebuds, igniting delightful surprises. It didn't take long before you clean your plate. Since there is no one around... it's okay to lick the plate, right?
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 12% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
